answerText: "Identity Card"[10] This Palestinian poet repeated the line, "Write down! / I am an Arab," in "Identity Card."
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Penn A, Louisville | 11 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this poem which ends by saying, "I do not hate people / Nor do I encroach / But if I become hungry / The usurper's flesh will be my food / Beware / Beware"
